alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 11 at 9:51AM CST until December 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Calcasieu River Near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier. * WHEN...From late Monday night to Wednesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 3.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 3.5 feet this afternoon. It will then rise to flood stage Tuesday morning. It will fall to 3.9 feet Tuesday evening. It will then rise to flood stage Wednesday morning. It will fall for the remainder of the period. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Calcasieu River Salt Water Barrie 4.0 3.6 Sun 6 am CST 3.8 3.9 3.9 &&
